body:
### Type of change

- Task

### Description

This PR removes the Mirror Maker 1 support from the Strimzi Cluster operator and related parts. It should remove it from:
* The API
* Cluster Operator
* Container images (startup scripts)
* Examples and installation files (CRD, RBACs, environment variables, etc.)
* Helm Chart
* Example dashboards and Alert manager rules
* System tests
* Docs
* Mirror Maker readiness agent

### Checklist

- [x] Make sure all tests pass
- [x] Update documentation
- [x] Check RBAC rights for Kubernetes / OpenShift roles
- [x] Try your changes from Pod inside your Kubernetes and OpenShift cluster, not just locally
- [x] Update CHANGELOG.md
Excellent. Thanks for cleaning up the docs.
LGTM. I just left one question.
